summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6030 for the improvement of 30th Avenue Northeast from East 65th Street to East 80th Street, and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 81794, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
